movies.title: Shaolin contre Wu Tong
movies.plot: Two friends from rival schools are turned against one another by a jealous chief who wants to eliminate those whose fighting styles may rival his own.
movies.simplePlot: Two friends from rival schools are turned against one another by a jealous chief who wants to eliminate those whose fighting styles may rival his own.

biography.bio: Chia-Hui Liu was born on August 22, 1951 in Guangdong, China as Jin-Hsi Shin. He is known for his work on Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003), Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004) and The 36th Chamber of Shaolin (1978).
biography.name: Chia-Hui Liu

biography.bio: Adam Cheng was born on February 24, 1947 in Hong Kong as Cheng Choung-She. He is known for his work on Zu: Warriors from the Magic Mountain (1983), The Legend (1993) and Saving General Yang (2013). He has been married to Kuan Ching-Hua since 1989. They have two children. He was previously married to Lydia Shum.
biography.name: Adam Cheng

biography.bio: Li Ching was born on November 8, 1948 in Shandong Province, China. She is an actress, known for Duo qing jian ke wu qing jian (1977), Shaolin contre Wu Tong (1983) and Boxer from Shantung (1972).
biography.name: Li Ching

biography.bio: Idy Chan was born on March 25, 1960 in Hong Kong as Chan Yuk Lin. She is an actress, known for Casino Raiders (1989), Shaolin contre Wu Tong (1983) and Return of the Condor Heroes (1983).
biography.name: Idy Chan

biography.bio: Hwang-ki Baek is an actor, known for Tae (1986), Shaolin contre Wu Tong (1983) and Dragoneer 5: The Indomitable (1979).
biography.name: Hwang-ki Baek

biography.bio: Shen Chan was born on March 11, 1940 in Taichung, Taiwan as Chan Yi-cheng. He was an actor, known for The Legend of the 7 Golden Vampires (1974), Five Fingers of Death (1972) and Cleopatra Jones and the Casino of Gold (1975). He was married to Shirley Yu. He died on April 26, 1984.
biography.name: Shen Chan

biography.bio: Yung Chan is an actor and production manager, known for Ban xian jiang (1988), Liu mang te jing (2000) and Legendary Weapons of China (1982).
biography.name: Yung Chan

biography.bio: Chiang Chen is an actor and assistant director, known for Flash Challenger (1973), Kung Fu Inferno (1973) and Mean Streets of Kung-Fu (1973).
biography.name: Chiang Chen

biography.bio: Hung Chen is an actor, known for Five Deadly Venoms (1978), La vengeance des infirmes (1978) and Five Element Ninjas (1982).
biography.name: Hung Chen

biography.bio: Wing-Cheung Cheung is known for his work on Mr. Vampire (1985), Triad Election (2006) and Vengeance (2009).
biography.name: Wing-Cheung Cheung

biography.bio: Han Chiang was born in Shandong, China. He is an actor, known for Bo ming dan tui (1973), Lost Souls (1980) and Shatter (1974).
biography.name: Han Chiang

biography.bio: Liang Chiang is known for his work on Police Story (1985), Huang jia shi jie (1985) and Hua jie shi dai (1985).
biography.name: Liang Chiang

biography.bio: Miao Ching was born on March 13, 1913 in Shandong Province, China. He was an actor, known for Shi er jin pai (1970), Le sabreur solitaire (1969) and Chinese Vengeance (1973). He died in 1989 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Miao Ching

biography.bio: Sung-Hao Hsu is known for his work on Mad Mission Part 2: Aces Go Places (1983), Bai she zhuan (1962) and Huo zhu gui (1989).
biography.name: Sung-Hao Hsu

biography.bio: Shu-Kuang Huang is an actor, known for Shaolin contre Wu Tong (1983), Disciples of the 36th Chamber (1985) and Lightning Fists of Shaolin (1984).
biography.name: Shu-Kuang Huang
